'''Blazing Match''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Yoimiya refunds 25% of each different material used. If the quantity of a material used is not a multiple of 4, then the quantity refunded is randomly rounded either up or down. For example, if 6 of a material is used, then Yoimiya will refund either 1 or 2 of that material.

==Trivia==
* In Japanese and Chinese, the name of the talent can be translated as "The Art of Combining Flame Colors" {{Lang|zh=炎色配比法|ja=炎色の配合法|sort=ja,zh}}. This may be a reference to the chemical {{w|Flame test|flame tests}} conducted by pyrotechnicians in order to obtain certain desired colors for fireworks.
